# Docker Utils

## Installation

```bash
python3 -m venv env
source env/bin/activate
pip install .
```

```bash
pip install wheel
pip install twine
python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
twine upload dist/*
```

https://pypi.org/project/cyberdockerutilstoto/0.1/

```bash
pip install cyberdockerutilstoto==0.1
```
